llm_decision.raw:
LANGUAGE: Hindi  
TRANSCRIPTION: तुम्हारे पास तीन महीने बच्चे हैं  
CONFIDENCE: high  
REASONING: Among all the hypotheses, "मरे बस दिन महीने बचे हम" (MMS-ZeroShot-Constrained) is grammatically incorrect and semantically nonsensical, so it is rejected. "Whisper" and "Omni" both suggest "बच्छे", which is a colloquial or regional variant of "बच्चे" (child). However, "बच्चे" is the standard, widely used Hindi word for "children" in this context, while "बच्छे" is less common and typically used in rural or dialectal speech. "MMS-1B" and "Omni" use "बच्चे", which is more standard and natural in formal or standard Hindi. The correct and most natural phrase is "तुम्हारे पास तीन महीने बच्चे है
